custom-sql.sql: select e.employeeId, e.employeeName, d.designationName from foo_designation d, foo_employee e where d.designationId = e.designationId
select employeeId,employeeName,employeeMobile,employeeEmail,branchId,departmentId,designationId from foo_employee where employeeName Like ?

select e.employeeId,e.employeeName,e.employeeMobile,e.employeeEmail,e.branchId,e.departmentId,e.designationId from foo_employee as e LEFT JOIN foo_branch as b ON b.branchId = e.branchId LEFT JOIN foo_department as d ON d.departmentId = e.departmentId LEFT JOIN foo_designation as de ON de.designationId = e.designationId where b.branchName LIKE ? or d.departmentName LIKE ? or de.designationName LIKE ? or e.employeeName LIKE ?
